Text: REMINDERpst Our Negotiating International Border Disputes conference is only two weeks away and at this stage we would like to confirm that Dr Ewald Limon Acting Permanent Secretary Ministry of Foreign Affairs Suriname will be attending The following companies have confirmed their participation ExxonMobil Amerada Hess BG Group Cairn Energy Unocal Petroleum GeoServices Inc Fusion Oil Gas Eversheds Gaffney Cline Associates Masons Verner Liipfert Trowers Hamlins Staatsolie Maatschappij Suriname BP Ashurst Morris Crisp KerrMcGee and DJ Freeman To guarantee your place at this high profile strategic conference please do not hesitate to contact me and I will be happy to complete the registration over the phone Kind Regards Myah McAlpine Switchboard Fax mailto FORTHCOMING ENERGY EVENTS Environmental Strategy Sustaining an Effective Balance in the Upstream Oil Gas Sector Tuesday th Wednesday th March One Whitehall Place London
